XII.ii.2.D.7.a
.
Hines ITC Message Six Months Prior to the Child’s 18
th
Birthday
Six months prior to the child’s 18
th
birthday, the Hines Information Technology Center (ITC) furnishes message code 688,
Child Reaching Age 18 Special Allowance SEC 1312(A)
.
title: M21-1, Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D - Authorization and Notification for the Special Allowance Under 38 U.S.C. 1312(a)
citation: Part XII, Subpart ii, Chapter 2, Section D
